data.message: I have a Friend who's facebook has been hacked. She tried to make a new one but the hacker reported the new account she made what other recourse does my friend have ? I've checked the help form but it suggests the facebook.com/hacked method however the hacker changed the email address as well as the trusted friends. My friend has no other recourse to get her profile back. Please help 　 i've checked the forums thru and back

replies.message: Hi, Harold. If your friend can't get into their account because it was taken over by someone else, please tell them to go to the Hacked Accounts section to get immediate help. Learn how: http://bit.ly/2dXnDdO. -Rhea
